Articles.Content: I find myself really enjoying the little things in this update. Like the Whack A Kerbal. (Alt-F3 Debug menu, click show Whack-A-Kerbal, press Middle Mouse Button to fire) It it really cool to see Space Station One destroyed by those balls. I do kind of wish thier velocity would be dependent on wether or not the navball is saying Orbit, Surface, or Target when the objects are launched. I also really enjoy the KSPX parts. I hope to see more from Claira. I think more updates should focus a bit more on just parts. plenty of parts. Of course, not without the new features.
I, too, enjoy playing with my balls in space.
Lol aphox. I haven't downloaded it yet.

Whack a Kerbal!?

Hurry up and end school!!!! I've got Kerbals to hit with a wooden hammer!

Wait, it launches them? EVEN BETTER!!!
Speaking of the little things: I enjoy that they finally tweaked the descriptions for the smaller unfolding solar panels so you can actually tell the 2x3 ones from the 1x6 ones.
I like how the Kerbals have only two stats, which currently mean nothing. Stupidity, and courage.
Is there any way for those of use who don't have middle mouse buttons to play Whack-a-Kerbal?
